name: Neon Festival
description:
Neon Festival is a game clearly inspired by guitar hero 
(at least that was the idea). With some game mechanics and 
some interesting effects Neon Festival tries to give you a 
challenging experience if you're not smart. Hit your saber 
correctly or miss!   
  
This is my first time actually participating in a gamejam. I 
learned a lot about what I can do, what I can't do, what I 
didn't do and what I could have done. It was one of the best 
experiences I've had, even though I couldn't get the result I
wanted (which was impossible) I still think I got something 
reasonable and presentable. 
Thanks for who played the game!  
And for those who want to know the number of team members are: 
Me (Programmer and half mouth artist) and a friend of mine who 
understands music and also gave some good ideas for this game to 
become what it is.
